value: - the administrative capital of Hsinchu County
(雪霸國家公園) - a beautiful park spanning a mountain range
(司馬庫斯) - a remote area inhabited by an aboriginal tribe and famous for its ancient cypress trees.
(鎮西堡) - a village in the mountains with peach farms and giant cypress trees

Hsinchu has a reasonable busing service. Price is 15nt (or 50cents US) to go around the city. During peak hours busses are every 10~15 minutes, though they aren't always on time.
Easiest way is to get around by scooter or Taxi. Taxi prices are cheap here, though drivers drive rather fast and your first taxi drive will be an adventure!
